reviewText: This Movie was filmed in my hometown. But this is a movie. that can show you that the lord will never give you more than you can handle. I would suggest this movie to anyone of all ages. I wish the movie industry would go back to making movies like this again maybe it would hhelp the world and our country. Thank You. I love my copy dearly..

This one really got to me. Very well portrayed; as if the lead actor could really identify with what was happening...and according to another reviewer, he could. This movie will rank as one of my favorites due to the sincere acting and great message. I highly recommend this film to anyone going through any kind of marital crisis (or really anyone who has lost hope).
I know the producer- and it was written bout things he had went through- being an advocate for those needing to overcome - this movie gives one hope- u can be an overcomer with God by ur side..
